Entries.default: "The boar is pleased. You have endured all threats, persevering where your lessers have faltered. Do you have what it takes to be the chosen survivor? Return to the Pool of Memories and discover your resilience."
"A single bone easily snaps, but the bundle does not. The slightest of menaces can present a meaningful threat with sufficient number."
"Your foes - once legion! - are now but dust. Though you will someday join them in rot, today you live."
"The boar, a stranger to fatigue and despair, knows only to struggle until the very end. Toamowhai's boar has no comprehension of defeat and in death still rages."
"If a pack of our chosen cannot survive your wrath, then perhaps nothing is beyond your capacity to hunt."
"Endure, and you will be victorious. Good hunting."
"All living things are mere prey to the guls. Fight and survive, or lay down your soul to sate their hunger."
"It appears even a glut of guls cannot overcome you. Good... This crowd clearly would see more of you."
"You will face foes immune to pain and suffering - the echoes of hate and violence that have endured beyond the struggles of the living."
"Your foe resists destruction at every turn, yet still you emerge victorious. Impressive."
"Constructs resist all but the most grievous physical harm, so the creator of these machines built a device to check his creations. Alas, he failed to properly employ his invention."
"The late animancer's creations have been contained. Well done, Watcher."
"Archmage Erasti's library was lost to the hands of his own imps. Guard the notes with your lives, for your lives may depend on them."
"Had you been there to assist, perhaps we would remember Erasti's work, instead of only remembering the conflict wherein it was all lost."
"Endure, and you will be victorious. Good hunting."
